content: परिजल्पितं A covert indication (as by a servant) of one's own skill, superiority &c. by pointing out the cruelty, deceitfulness and such other faults of his master; <ls>Ujjvalamaṇi</ls> thus defines it: --प्रभोर्निर्दयताशाठ्यचापलाघुपपादनात् . स्वविचणताव्यक्तिर्भंग्या स्यात्परिजल्पितम् .. (Wilson renders the word by ‘the covert reproaches of a mistress neglected or ill-used by her lover’).
